definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: The Maybach has been adopted as the ultimate status symbol by Russia's super-rich.
sentences.chinese: 邁巴赫被視作俄國超級富豪的”終極身份象徵“。

sentences.english: We see this platform as winning.
sentences.chinese: 我們把這個平臺視作一種勝利。

sentences.english: In feudal society, the dragon also be regarded as a symbol of the emperor.
sentences.chinese: 在封建社會，龍更被視作帝王的象徵。

sentences.english: It sees the dead as lovers, too.
The Boxer episode is commonly portrayed in the West as an orgy of anti-foreign violence.
sentences.chinese: 在西方，義和團被視作反西方的暴力狂歡。

sentences.english: Bituminous coal is often treated as a consistent and homogeneous product.
sentences.chinese: 煙煤一般被視作一種質地均勻一致的產品。

sentences.english: All the cultural activities in Gannan should be regarded as hakka culture occurancies.
sentences.chinese: 歷史上發生於贛南的文化事象都應視作客家文化。

sentences.english: In the a ence of such indication, the credit shall be deemed to be revocable.
sentences.chinese: 如無該項表示，信用證應視作是可撤銷的。

sentences.english: Before being liberated from slavery, these people had been scorned and used and treated as outcasts.
sentences.chinese: 以色列人脫離奴役前，飽受嘲弄利用，被視作賤民。

sentences.english: Reporters used to be considered non-combatants. Not anymore.
sentences.chinese: 記者通常被視作非戰鬥人員，現在就不行了。

sentences.english: I could have him for my fellow worker but not for a friend.
sentences.chinese: 我可以把他看做我的同事，卻不能視作朋友。

sentences.english: Management dismissed the union's behavior as irresponsible and unreasonable.
sentences.chinese: 管理層把工會行爲視作不負責任和無理要求草草處理。

sentences.english: So exactly what in this case is supposed to be delusive?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，這個例子中究竟有什麼應被視作欺幻呢？

sentences.english: Payment made before mid- night on the due date will be regarded as on- time payment.
sentences.chinese: 於到期日午夜前繳款會被視作準時繳交。

sentences.english: There was no room for details that were to be viewed as individual elements.
sentences.chinese: 細節不應被視作獨個的元素。

sentences.english: In four seasons with Cleveland, Diop was deemed a bust.
sentences.chinese: 在克里夫蘭的4個賽季，迪奧普被視作水貨。
